item.title: TAIR will continue with subscription support
item.description: A new plan that includes subscription support will keep TAIR available to researchers for the long term. Read more here...

item.title: TAIR moved to servers at iPlant
item.description: Ordering and registration services are available after the completion of the TAIR move to servers at iPlant.

item.title: TAIR moving to servers at iPlant
item.description: Ordering and registration will be disabled from Friday May 17 to Monday May 20 while we move data files to the new server. All services will be restored on May 20 and the URL will remain the same.

item.title: ABRC Fee Increase
item.description: There will be a fee increase for stocks and orders beginning July 1, 2013. This raise in fees is in accordance to our Business Plan submitted to NSF.

item.title: New Set of Confirmed T-DNA Lines Available
item.description: The fourth one-allele set of confirmed T-DNA lines representing 3,263 new loci is now available for ordering as CS27944.

item.title: New from ABRC Education and Outreach
item.description: ABRC is pleased to announce a re-designed Education and Outreach website. The website allows quick and easy donation of education modules, direct ordering and online evaluation of education kits.

item.title: 2012 MASC Report Now Available
item.description: Please check out the latest report from the Multinational Arabidopsis Steering Committee.
